Address.value: 205 SOUTH HOOVER BOULEVARD,SUITE 210, TAMPA, Florida, 33609, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Odyssey Marine Exploration, Inc. (NasdaqCM: OMEX) is a deep-ocean exploration pioneer that provides access to critical mineral resources. The company uses innovative methods and cutting-edge technology to discover, validate and develop subsea mineral deposits in an environmentally and socially responsible manner. Odyssey's growing project portfolio includes different mineral sets in various jurisdictions around the world.
